level.heading: Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary addition of section, see § 2(f) of the Drug House Abatement Emergency Amendment Act of 1996 (D.C. Act 11-446, December 5, 1996, 43 DCR 6664).

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 11-176, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 42-3631.
